title: cifti-label-to-border
description:
Draw borders around cifti labels.

For each surface, takes the labels on the matching structure and draws borders around the labels.  Use -column to only draw borders around one label map.

opt_placement_fraction.title: opt_placement_fraction
opt_placement_fraction.description: set how far along the edge border points are drawn: fraction along edge from inside vertex (default 0.33)

opt_column_column.title: opt_column_column
opt_column_column.description: select a single column: the column number or name

surface.title: surface
surface.description: the surface to use for neighbor and structure information

items.title: border
items.description: specify output file for a surface structure

border.title: border
border.description: specify output file for a surface structure
